name: vcOS
author: John Wry

sections.description:
vcOS – Villa Charcas Online School es un plugin diseñado para proveer una escuela en linea. Se puede crear materias donde cada materia tiene varias lecciones. Cada lección tiene una evaluación y posibilidad de trabajo practico adjunto. Al final de la materia, un examen final.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
Descarga el plugin de WordPress.org. Luego de instalar, hay que configurar en opciones->vcOS.
Despues de crear materias en vcOS-ADMIN, hay que habilitarlas para que sean visibles al usuario.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

What about foo bar?
sections.changelog:
1.4.0

1.3.9

*grades bug fixed

1.3.7

1.3.6

  • bad grading bug fixed

1.3.5

  • “removed” copy paste from vcos_content div

1.3.4

  • lessons eval bug fixed

1.3.3

  • new lessons view bug fixed

1.3.2

  • added percentages
  • fixed bug with evals/pracs

1.3.0

  • added student can view his grades

1.2.6

*Bug fixed – exam grade works

1.2.5

  • student grades

1.2.0

  • finished up practical homework
  • final exams works

1.1.5

  • fixed bug – widget didn’t show courses right
  • fixed bug – updating courses disabled the course

1.1.4

  • new feature – course information given on signup
  • fixed bug where teachers couldn’t update courses

1.1.0

  • fixed bug that disabled ADMIN from creating new courses

1.1

  • teachers can now create homework (trabajo practico)
  • fixed bug that only enabled courses can be viewed

1.4.0

This is a working version. Nothing fancy but with some help we do hope to get vcOS in good working order soon!
